name: ClimateFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Climate Facts”
”Say a climate fact”
”Tell me a climate change fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: climate facts
des: This skill contains facts about our current climate and how it is changing. In addition, the skill has facts about the climates and weather patterns of different countries around the world. Expansion packs are available to purchase which will allow you to have access to even more facts about the weather in different countries and continents.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
